video_name: 复杂情况_李冰冰_1_英文_正常节奏_女声_15.mp4
prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A woman wearing an elegant off-shoulder white blouse and a flowing beige skirt sits gracefully indoors, speaking with expressive openness as she turns her head slowly through three positions. The scene shows a young East Asian woman, likely in her late twenties to early thirties, with dark hair styled in a soft updo and subtle makeup enhancing her calm features. She wears a delicate necklace and holds a small silver embellished handbag resting gently on her lap. Her lips move fluidly as she speaks with clear articulation, conveying warmth and presence without urgency. The background is minimalist, featuring a smooth pale wall that softly diffuses the ambient light, creating a serene and polished atmosphere typical of a studio or refined interior space. She begins facing forward, then smoothly turns her head toward her right side while maintaining a composed posture, before returning gently to face forward again. Her right hand rests lightly on the handbag’s handle, fingers relaxed and occasionally adjusting its position with quiet grace. Her left arm remains softly bent beside her, contributing to the poised yet natural demeanor. The lighting is even and flattering, highlighting the texture of her clothing and the gentle contours of her face. The camera remains steady at eye level, capturing her upper body and the subtle rhythm of her movements as she communicates with quiet confidence and expressive clarity.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering and frame skips. A woman appears as a deformed, disfigured figure with unnatural proportions — her face warped, teeth misaligned and crooked, deep exaggerated wrinkles etched across her skin, eyes sunken or mismatched. Her dark hair is frayed and clumped, lacking definition, failing to frame her face. She wears a poorly rendered off-shoulder white blouse and beige skirt, both textured with low-resolution noise and inconsistent folds. Her hands are grotesquely twisted, fingers broken and trembling violently, occasionally clipping through the silver handbag resting on her lap — which itself flickers, shatters into pixels, or vanishes intermittently. Her mouth remains frozen in a single rigid shape, lips unmoving despite attempted speech, creating an eerie disconnect between audio and visuals. Her head jerks abruptly instead of tilting smoothly — snapping from front to side with no transition, then glitching back. Posture collapses into unnatural angles, shoulders hunched or disjointed, movements erratic and spasmodic. The background is a chaotic collage of grainy textures, vertical stripes, and overlapping patterns, devoid of depth or coherence. Lighting is harsh, uneven, and over-saturated — casting jagged shadows, blown-out highlights, and unnatural color bleeding. Camera work is aggressively unstable: rapid cuts, abrupt zooms, tilted framing, and inconsistent eye-level shots that break composition entirely. Visual style is low-quality 3D animation with extreme contrast, oversharpened edges, heavy grain, digital artifacts, and intrusive watermarks or text overlays. No harmony exists between expression, gesture, or motion — only distortion, fragmentation, and visual decay.

prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A young man wearing a formal black suit with a crisp white shirt and neatly tied black tie stands on a softly lit stage, his expression calm yet deeply expressive as he speaks with gentle intensity. The scene shows a young East Asian man, likely in his late twenties, with neatly styled dark hair and subtle earpieces visible. His face is composed but animated, his mouth opening wide in a smooth, deliberate motion as he articulates each word with clear emphasis. His lips move fluidly, shaping sounds with grace and precision. The background features warm ambient lighting with soft orange bokeh highlights, suggesting a performance or presentation setting. The man begins by facing forward, then slowly turns his head to the side with a slight tilt, maintaining eye contact as if addressing different sections of an audience, before gently returning his gaze to the front. His hands rise slightly from his sides, palms open and fingers relaxed, moving in slow, rhythmic gestures that complement his speech. His posture remains poised, shoulders steady, conveying quiet confidence. The atmosphere is intimate and focused, blending elegance with emotional presence. The camera holds steady at chest level, capturing his upper body and the subtle dynamics of his movement as he delivers his message with thoughtful clarity and expressive calm.
